expo.name: Funlynk
expo.description: Discover and connect through shared experiences. Join activities, meet like-minded people, and build meaningful connections in your community.

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Funlynk uses your location to help you discover activities and events near you.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Funlynk uses your camera to let you take photos for your profile and activities.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Funlynk uses your photo library to let you select photos for your profile and activities.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Funlynk can access your contacts to help you find friends who are already using the app.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Funlynk to use your location to discover activities near you.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with your activities.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app accesses your camera to let you take photos for your activities.
